document_data.mainbody:
indabar Street was a road that was located in the city of Waterdeep.
Nindabar Street was located in the eastern section of Waterdeeps North Ward. The road spanned much of the ward from north to south, connect Saerdoun Street in the north with Zendulth Street in the south. Nindabar Street was also intersected by Hassantyrs Street, Endcliff Lane, Sulmor Street, Tarsers Street, Suldown Street, Brahiirs Street, Golden Serpent Street, and the Passar.
* Twilight Hunters tavern
